definition: foot of a bird or animal/paw/claws/talons
(coll.) foot of an animal or bird/(coll.) foot supporting a cooking pot etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Pricks his thin claw within some delicate nerve;
sentences.chinese: 以尖刻的爪子，刺痛敏感的神经。

sentences.english: The dog is clawing a hole.
Animals use their claws or talons to catch prey, climb trees, and defend themselves.
sentences.chinese: 动物使用爪子来捕获猎物，攀爬树木和自我防御。

sentences.english: Leopards have the sharp claw, uses for to prey on.
sentences.chinese: 金钱豹有锋利的爪子，用来捕食。

sentences.english: King pawed the door again, and Gallagher understood in a flash.
sentences.chinese: “国王”又在用爪子抓扯烤箱的门了。

sentences.english: Using the paws, he chew the bamboo very slowly with his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 用爪子，他慢慢的咀嚼竹子非常他口中所出的声音。

sentences.english: A single blow of the lion's paw and his cosmogony is smashed.
sentences.chinese: 狮子举起爪子扇一下，他的世界便被打得粉碎。

sentences.english: Handheld long have very sharp Bear paw, to firmly grasp food.
sentences.chinese: 掌上长有十分锐利的熊爪子，能紧紧抓住食物。

sentences.english: The lion's sharp claw hit the wolf's head hard .
sentences.chinese: 狮子锋利的爪子对着老狼的脑袋狠狠地击了一掌。

sentences.english: Their long claws allow them to fasten onto the rocks and hold firm.
sentences.chinese: 它们的长爪子使它们能够扣住岩石并紧紧抓住。

sentences.english: Draw his legs with strong paw-like feet.
sentences.chinese: 他的腿要具有较强的像爪子一般的感觉。

sentences.english: He can fetch a stick, shake a paw, and play dead.
sentences.chinese: 他能拿棍子，挥舞它的爪子，和装死。

sentences.english: The eagle swooped down and caught a fish in its talons .
sentences.chinese: 鹰俯冲下来然后用爪子捕获了一条鱼。

sentences.english: We really get annoyed when foreigners try to chomp on chicken feet.
sentences.chinese: 我们真的很讨厌外国人咬鸡爪子时的样子。

sentences.english: I was regaled with the scaly tips of the drumsticks of the fowls.
sentences.chinese: 给我吃的全是带着鳞皮的鸡爪子。

sentences.english: I bandage his knuckles, which is hard with these claws I have.
sentences.chinese: 我用绷带包扎他被我爪子弄伤的指关节。

definition: foot of a bird or animal/paw/claws/talons
(coll.) foot of an animal or bird/(coll.) foot supporting a cooking pot etc
